==Gameplay Notes==
*Cryo Slimes are immune to [[Frozen]], but they can be [[wet]]. This may occur from contact with Hydro Slimes, Hydro-based attacks, and [[rain]]. When attacked with [[Anemo]] they will swirl [[Hydro]] (in preference) initially until that status is removed, after which they then swirl with Cryo. The wet status is only briefly indicated together with Anemo on a Swirl.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A small monster created through the coagulation of Cryo in the natural environment.<br>Competitors once spread malicious rumors that the Dawn Winery used Cryo [[Slimes]] to control the temperature of their wine cellar and preserve the quality of their alcohol.|[[Archive]]}}
